directions: [["In a large pan, combine brine ingredients and stir until the sugar and salt are dissolved. Bring to a boil and lower heat to simmer."],["Equally distribute pickle ingredients between sterilized jars and cover with warm brine. "],["Cap jars and let seal. "],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
notes: For best results, refrigerate after jars have cooled and keep refrigerated to maintain pickle crispiness.
